languages.english-overview:
Yclas is a free open source powerful PHP classifieds script that can help you start a website and turn it into a fully customizable classifieds site within a few minutes.
You can be as creative as you want with Yclas, create a marketplace, job board, real estate, car dealer or anything you want! modify text, customize fields, add users to help you moderate the website and many more features.
Yclas is released under the GNU GPL.
languages.english-exp_ad_pass: New password. Leave blank if you do not want to reset the password
languages.english-err_no_email: Please provide the email to reset the password
languages.english-err_no_such_email: The Admin email is incorrect and does not exist!
